resources.string: Connecting accounts not possible: Unfortunately neither &Charge nor a browser is installed
Congratulations, you have linked your account with &Charge!
There was an issue within &Charge: The result url is missing the parameter "OK"…
There was an issue within &Charge: The result url is missing the parameter "error"…
Your request was missing a mandatory parameter. Please check the URL.
The given user is already linked to another &Charge account.
No partner found for the given partnerId.
Something went wrong on side of &Charge. Please get in touch with us, we\'ll have a look into it.
We did not recognize the activation code you gave us in the URL.
Something went wrong within the &Charge app. Please get in touch with us, we\'ll have a look into it.
